revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Belkin |model=F9K1113 |revision=v1 |upc=722868883211 |asin=B008982LD4;GB; |price=160 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=WG9117D |manuf_rev=AC22-AK |availability=now |est_release_date=06/12/2012 |fcc_date=05/16/2012 |fcc_id=K7SF9K1113V1 |ic_id=3623A-F9K1113V1 |pcb_id=141911720005J |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4718A1;BCM4718A1KFBG, CS1231 P11, 217324 N1 W; |cpu1_cspeed=480 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12835EMI-10G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM68B16CWQD-25H |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4718A1;BCM4718A1KFBG, CS1231 P11, 217324 N1 W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4352;BCM4352KMLG, TT1230 P10, 218117 6 B W; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53125S;BCM53125SKMMLG, TE1233 P20, 226693 3 W; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux;2.6.22; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=belkin.XXX, belkin.XXX.5GHz, belkin.XXX.guests |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=EC:1A:59 |oui_eth=EC:1A:59 }} {{TagLine|AC1200 Dual Band Wi-Fi Dual-Band AC+ Gigabit Router}} :"P/N: 141911720005J R01" is silkscreened on the main board. :"P/N: 141882220001J R01" is silkscreened on the wireless module. *[http://www.marketwatch.com/story/belkin-debuts-80211ac-wi-fir-dual-band-ac-gigabit-routers-2012-06-21 Belkin Debuts 802.11ac Wi-Fi(R) Dual-Band AC+ Gigabit Routers] :300Mbps on 2.4GHz + 867Mbps on 5GHz ===Serial=== ====Pinout==== The serial pinout for the device seems to be the following. 
J3
[3.3][TxD][RxD][GND]
  1    2    3

}} ====nvram show==== '''@ [[Belkin_F9K1113_v1/nvram]]''' ==Images== ===from [[User:M86|M86]]=== Image:Belkin_F9K1113v1_board_top.JPG|board top Image:Belkin_F9K1113v1_BCM4718A1.JPG|BCM4718A1 11bgn WiSoC Image:Belkin_F9K1113v1_Flash.JPG|Flash Image:Belkin_F9K1113v1_RAM.JPG|RAM Image:Belkin_F9K1113v1_BCM4352.JPG|BCM4352 11ac chip Image:Belkin_F9K1113v1_BCM53125.JPG|BCM53125 GbE Switch Image:Belkin_F9K1113v1_board_top_power_etc.JPG|board top, power / USB section Image:Belkin_F9K1113v1_NXP_74HC595D.JPG|NXP 74HC595D, presumably for LED control Image:Belkin_F9K1113v1_Serial.JPG|Serial header Image:Belkin_F9K1113v1_main_board_Arcadyan_PN.JPG|Arcadyan P/N on the board Image:Belkin_F9K1113v1_Arcadyan_label.JPG|Arcadyan device label [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
